name: SKYDIE
description:
This is our submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. Probably our shortest time developing yet, we've probably spent less than 24 hours on this between two people.

Goal: Do your best to connect with your fellow skydivers, and watch out for the obstacles!  Control your main character to make sure they clear the obstacles!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys. Hint: It helps to focus on the main character with a triangle shaped parachute pack.

w or Up arrow - moves you radially toward the center of the screen

s or Down arrow - moves you radially outward from the center of the screen

a or Left arrow - moves you (and your team) clockwise

d or Right arrow - moves you (and your team) counterclockwise

Developed for:

Original Hatwerks content.
